p: Change the program we just wrote to remove the put_token() instruction. Then try this slightly modified program with the following hurdle races Hurdles 1, Hurdles 2 and Hurdles 3. You will find that this program, which is quite different than the ones you had written before, works just as well.
Now, try it with Hurdles 4. Surprise! It works whereas the previous program did not!
Try the same modified program again with either Maze 1 or Maze 2.
As you will see, this simple program can find the exit to this maze!
